title: GDG Hyderabad
description: The membership is free & open to newbies, developers, students, organizations and for everyone who is interested in Google & Open Source technologies.
keywords: event, gdg, gde, devfest, google, programming, android, chrome, polymer, developers, web, cloud, androiddev, hyderabad, india
subscribeNote: GDG Hyderabad is an independent group; our activities and the opinions expressed here should in no way be linked to Google, the corporation.
ticketsTitle: Be a Developer, Be a Hero
ticketsDetails: The membership is open to newbies, developers, students, organizations and for everyone who is interested in Google's technologies.

clickToViewPhotos: Click here to view more photos
locationDescription: Hyderabad, the City of Pearls, one of the most dynamic cities across the world with an exponential growth of Tech & Startup community
aboutOrganizers: Google Developers Group Hyderabad is a drive to concentrate the efforts of many developers in and around the magnificent city of Hyderabad to learn, share and get productive using the various Google products. It was founded in 2008 and reactivated on 17 February 2012. In order to reach out to more developers on specific domains, GDG Hyderabad has inaugurated Android User Club on 23 March 2013. Also, a special community called Women Techmakers has been founded for Women to bridge the gap between women coming from Science, Technology, Engineering & Management (STEM).
aboutGdg:
Google Developer Groups (GDGs) are for developers who are interested in Google's developer technology; everything from the Android, Chrome, Drive, and Google Cloud platforms, to product APIs like the Cast API, Maps API, and YouTube API. 
 
 A GDG can take many forms -- from just a few people getting together to watch our latest video, to large gatherings with demos and tech talks, to events like code sprints and hackathons. However, at the core, GDGs are focused on developers and technical content, and the core audience should be developers.
aboutWtm: A diverse mix of voices leads to better discussions, decisions, and outcomes for everyone. - Sundar Pichai, CEO, Google Inc Diversity comes in different forms and plays a crucial role in uplifting society for better. Women Techmakers Hyderabad is a humble initiative to amplify opportunities for women across the city to learn, share and infuse creativity with a purpose to build a platform for making the contributions of women more visible and adaptable. Founded in 2013, as Geek Girls Hyderabad, the aim of the group has been to engage more women from different domains and across different ages into developing technological applications and accelerating the involvement of such brilliant minds for sharing their expertise.
aboutHydroid:
Since its inception as an open source mobile operating system, Android has in a way become the household application development tool and more and more people around the world have actively shown interest in learning the nitty gritty of this tool. Hydroid (Hyderabad Android Club) is hence a culmination of enthusiastic inputs and willingness to connect with budding technologists and developers who share tremendous love for learning Android. 
 
 
 The club focuses on hosting Android specific sessions ranging from beginners to advanced level. Whether  you are an expert or a  keen learner looking forward to get into the world of Android, GDG Hydroid is the place to be.
teamPageText:
19 years ago, a dream to make knowledge accessible universally came true. Fast forward to 2017, Google has grown into not just a firm that believes in its roots of continuous learning and sharing but also has become an integral part of our daily lives, as they say “googling around the world”.

At GDG Hyderabad, we believe in sharing the same values and expanding to more avenues of collaborating and co-developing ideas to build a creative and innovative platform for developers, technologists and passionate minds.

GDG Hyderabad is an open community run by the diverse and inspiring enthusiasm of its members. Our team is thus driven by this love for bringing an impactful change in the society with the power of technology and community spirit.
